sentence.Network_en: Flintlock: Ignition system for firearms early 16 th century, It'superseded the matchlock and the wheel lock.
sentence.Network_cn: 燧发机: 火器点火系统,始于16世纪初, 取代火绳机和转轮打火机转轮打火机.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 火字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 火钳〖 fire-tongs〗 火枪〖 flintlock;firelock〗 火墙〖 awallwarmwithfire〗.
图文2008年1月24日 - 燧发枪(Flintlock)的名字来自它的燧发式枪机(法语fusil,火镰),这种枪机是从燧石点火式转轮发火枪简化而来的,它的机械结构非常类似于后期的火绳枪,但是.

list.abs: a firearm having a flintlock type of gunlock ., 一种具有燧石扳机装置的火器.
a firearm a flintlock type of gunlock ., 一种具有燧石扳机装置的火器.

entry.def: A flintlock gun is a type of gun that was used in former times. It is fired by pressing a trigger which causes a spark struck from a flint to light gunpowder.

means.word_mean: 1. a muzzle loader having a flintlock type of gunlock
2. a gunlock that has flint embedded in the hammer; the flint makes a spark that ignites the charge

auth_sentence.content: From a wall festooned with flintlock rifles, Heston takes down a skinning knife made from a deer antler.
auth_sentence.res_content: From a wall festooned with flintlock rifles, Heston takes down a skinning knife made from a deer antler.
